title: vstplugin~
description: `vstplugin~` is part of vstplugin v0.6.0, a project that enables the use of VST2 and VST3 plugins in Pure Data (Pd) on Windows, macOS, and Linux. It supports audio, MIDI, and instrument plugins; parameter automation (sample accurate for VST3); multi-bus input/output; native or generic GUIs; preset management; MIDI I/O; tempo and transport sync; offline rendering; and plugin discovery in standard or custom paths. Additional features include bit-bridging, sandboxing, Windows plugin support on Linux via Wine, and optional multithreaded processing.

articles.title: [vstplugin~] – A Pd external for hosting VST plugins

videos.title: VST Plugins Inside of Pure Data!
